document_data.name: Waterdeep Way
document_data.mainbody:
'''Waterdeep Way''' was a main thoroughfare in the heart of the city of [[Waterdeep]]. It connected the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] to the [[Street of Silks]] at the courtyard surrounding [[Ahghairon's Tower]] and the [[Palace of Waterdeep]].
[[File:Palace of the Open Lord by Richard Sardinha.jpg|thumb|right|270px|''The view of the palace at the west end of Waterdeep Way.'']]
document_data.Description: This boulevard was completely paved with brick and carried heavy traffic most of the day. At the juncture with the High Road, practically all [[broadsheet]]s in Waterdeep were available from the many cryers there.{{Cite web/Realmslore/Broadcryers of Waterdeep IV: Know Thy Sources, Part Two}} [[Dray]]s and other coaches-for-hire were frequently found on Waterdeep Way and all of its connecting arteries. The buildings on this street were a mix of shops, [[Guilds of Waterdeep|guilds]], taverns, inns, and private residences.
document_data.Geography:
Starting at the High Road and marching west, Waterdeep Way was the southern terminus of the [[Street of Bells]], the [[Street of the Sword]], [[Warrior's Way]], the [[Street of Silver]], and finally it met the [[Street of Silks]] in the huge courtyard surrounding Ahghairon's Tower and grand entrance of the Palace of Waterdeep. Turning around and heading back east, the south side of Waterdeep Way near the Palace ran along the spur of [[Mount Waterdeep]] upon which sat [[Castle Waterdeep|the Castle]]. Further along, Waterdeep Way connected to [[Gem Street]] at the opening to [[Hillock Court]], and [[Snail Street]] right at the moot with the High Road.
[[File:CoSW-WaterdeepWay.png|thumb|center|600px|''Waterdeep Way ''circa'' 1372 DR.'']]
document_data.History: The walls protecting the city were moved northward in the {{YearlinkName|1064}}, leaving behind the tract of land that became Waterdeep Way.<ref name=CoS-CG-30" />
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The [[Jade Jug]], an inn on the corner with the High Road.
* The [[Asp's Strike]], a tavern on the courtyard around Ahghairon's Tower.
* [[Dragon's Head Tavern]], on the opposite side of the courtyard from the Asp's Strike.
* [[Aurora's Realms Shop, Waterdeep Way Catalogue Counter]], one of many [[Aurora's Emporium]] outlets.
* The [[Guildhall of the Order]], headquarters of the [[Solemn Order of Recognized Furriers and Woolmen]].
* The [[Map House (Waterdeep)|Map House]], headquarters of the [[Surveyors', Map-, and Chart-makers' Guild|Surveyors', Map-makers', and Chart-makers' Guild]].
* [[Fellowship Hall]], headquarters of the [[Fellowship of Innkeepers]].
